marytts.tools.voiceimport
Class HnmTimelineMaker

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.voiceimport.VoiceImportComponent
      marytts.tools.voiceimport.HnmTimelineMaker

public class HnmTimelineMaker
extends VoiceImportComponent

HnmTimelineMaker class takes a database root directory and a list of basenames, and converts the related wav files into a hnm timeline in Mary format.

Author:
Oytun Türk
